subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: WARNING!! WARNING!!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
A man after my own heart, Frank! Others may have their own thoughts and 
beliefs, but I'm with you on that.

I've never personally been harmed by a ghost either. Heck, they usually 
don't even drain my batteries when they do that to others on an 
investigation.

Zack

On Tue, 15 Apr 2008, purplespacefriend wrote:

> Relax! I've been doing box work longer than anyone around--I made the
> first ones. There was other systems that do the same thing in existence
> since the 80's as well, I have never heard of anyone being harmed in
> anyway. I don't do protection anything, no prayers, no white candles-
> nothin'!
>
>  That thing aobut Spiricom, I don't believe that! It's that same crap
> other researhers pull to keep the work, and profits more exclusive.
>
> Frank-S
>
